Module kivakit.core.test
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.test

Class UnitTestWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.TestWatcher
      • com.telenav.kivakit.core.test.UnitTestWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule
    public class UnitTestWatcher
extends org.junit.rules.TestWatcher
    A JUnit test watcher that prints out any random seed value when a random test fails so that the failure can be reproduced with RandomValueFactory.seed(long).
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
